data.lyric:
[ti:You Owe Me]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:You Owe Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You Owe Me - The Chainsmokers
[00:05.92]Written by：Andrew Taggart/Alex Pall/Emily Warren/Chelsea Jade
[00:11.84]I don't really say this that often
[00:14.39]
[00:16.86]But there's something that the papers forgot
[00:19.25]
[00:22.44]Every time I read them
[00:23.97]I know I feed them
[00:25.26]But I know
[00:26.76]
[00:27.71]They're painting but they can't leave a mark
[00:30.31]
[00:33.11]Cuz my friends don't read the papers
[00:35.97]
[00:38.40]And they don't really care if we're awesome or not
[00:42.16]
[00:43.64]So every time I read them
[00:45.11]I know I feed them
[00:46.55]But I know
[00:47.83]
[00:48.94]They want to see me hang on the wall
[00:51.36]
[00:54.50]You don't know me
[00:55.78]Don't you think that I get lonely
[00:58.38]It gets dark inside my head
[01:01.08]Check my pulse and if I'm dead you owe me
[01:04.47]
[01:05.04]If you're lonely
[01:06.47]Don't you think you're on your own
[01:08.82]When it gets dark inside your head
[01:11.72]Check my pulse and if I'm there you owe me
[01:15.04]
[01:21.09]Say it to my face if you mean it
[01:23.36]
[01:26.41]Say it to my face but you won't
[01:28.48]
[01:31.67]I know I'm not losing
[01:33.33]But I'm losing my mind
[01:36.06]
[01:37.11]Does anybody know what that's like
[01:39.24]
[01:42.51]You don't know me
[01:43.77]Don't you think that I get lonely
[01:46.38]It gets dark inside my head
[01:49.09]Check my pulse and if I'm dead you owe me
[01:52.40]
[01:53.00]If you're lonely
[01:54.35]Don't you think you're on your own
[01:56.72]When it gets dark inside your head
[01:59.75]Check my pulse and if I'm there you owe me
[02:02.97]
[02:06.60]And if I'm there you owe me
[02:08.45]
[02:11.98]And if I'm there you owe me
[02:14.13]You owe me
[02:14.90]
[02:15.41]You owe me
[02:16.38]
[02:19.81]You owe me
[02:20.73]You owe me
[02:21.78]
[02:22.53]And if I'm DEAD you owe me
[02:24.28]
[02:33.11]And if I'm there you owe me
[02:34.97]
[02:46.53]You don't know me
[02:47.84]Don't you think that I get lonely
[02:50.43]It gets dark inside my head
[02:53.02]Check my pulse and if I'm dead you owe me
[02:56.31]
[02:57.18]If you're lonely
[02:58.50]Don't you think you're on your own
[03:00.82]When it gets dark inside your head
[03:03.31]
[03:03.82]Check my pulse and if I'm dead you owe me
data.trans:
[ti:You Owe Me]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:You Owe Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.84]//
[00:11.68]我真的很少提起这些
[00:14.23]
[00:16.70]但有些事情我忘了记下来
[00:19.09]
[00:22.28]每一次我读起这些故事
[00:23.81]我知道 是我让丑恶不断滋生
[00:25.10]但我明白
[00:26.60]
[00:27.55]即使不断撰写 也不会留下痕迹
[00:30.15]
[00:32.95]因为我的朋友们都不喜欢阅读
[00:35.81]
[00:38.24]他们心底并不在意我们是否能够有所成就
[00:42.00]
[00:43.48]所以每一次我读起这些故事
[00:44.95]我知道 是我让丑恶不断滋生
[00:46.39]但我明白
[00:47.67]
[00:48.78]但我知道 那些朋友只想看我当众出丑

[00:51.20]
[00:54.34]你根本不了解我
[00:55.62]你不觉得我很孤独吗
[00:58.22]我的思绪愈加黑暗
[01:00.92]检查自己的脉搏强弱 要是我一命呜呼 这要算到你头上
[01:04.31]
[01:04.88]如果你孤身一人
[01:06.31]你不觉得你一直孤独无依吗
[01:08.66]你的思绪愈加黑暗
[01:11.56]检查自己的脉搏强弱 要是我一命呜呼 这要算到你头上
[01:14.88]
[01:20.93]如果你是认真的 那就直视我的脸
[01:23.20]
[01:26.25]看着我倾诉一切 但你不会这么做
[01:28.32]
[01:31.51]我知道 我没有迷失
[01:33.17]但我仿佛丧失了理智
[01:35.90]
[01:36.95]有谁知道这是怎样的滋味
[01:39.08]
[01:42.35]你根本不了解我
[01:43.61]你不觉得我很孤独吗
[01:46.22]我的思绪愈加黑暗
[01:48.93]检查自己的脉搏强弱 要是我一命呜呼 这要算到你头上

[01:59.59]检查自己的脉搏强弱 要是我一命呜呼 这要算到你头上
